org.bff.javampd

Interface CommandExecutor

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MPDCommandExecutor

    public interface CommandExecutor
    Author:
    bill

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String getMPDVersion()
      Returns the MPD version
      Collection<String> sendCommand(MPDCommand command)
      Sends a MPDCommand to the MPD server returning the response as a Collection of Strings.
      List<String> sendCommand(String command)
      Sends a command with no parameters to the MPD server returning the response as a List of Strings.
      List<String> sendCommand(String command, Integer... params)
      Sends a command and parameters to the MPD server returning the response as a List of Strings.
      List<String> sendCommand(String command, String... params)
      Sends a command and parameters to the MPD server returning the response as a List of Strings.
      boolean sendCommands(List<MPDCommand> commandList)
      Sends a list of MPDCommands all at once to the MPD server and returns true if all commands were sent successfully.

      Sets the MPD to run commands against

    • Method Detail

      • sendCommand

        List<String> sendCommand(String command)
                         throws MPDResponseException
        Sends a command with no parameters to the MPD server returning the response as a List of Strings.
        Parameters:
        command - the command to send
        Returns:
        the response as a Collection of Strings
        Throws:
        MPDResponseException - if the MPD response generates an error

      • sendCommand

        List<String> sendCommand(String command,
                       String... params)
                         throws MPDResponseException
        Sends a command and parameters to the MPD server returning the response as a List of Strings.
        Parameters:
        command - the command to send
        params - the parameters for the command
        Returns:
        the response as a Collection of Strings
        Throws:
        MPDResponseException - if the MPD response generates an error

      • sendCommand

                       Integer... params)

        Parameters:
        command - the command to send
        params - the parameters for the command
        Returns:
        the response as a Collection of Strings

      • sendCommand

        Collection<String> sendCommand(MPDCommand command)
                               throws MPDResponseException
        Sends a MPDCommand to the MPD server returning the response as a Collection of Strings.
        Parameters:
        command - the command to send
        Returns:
        the response as a Collection of Strings
        Throws:
        MPDResponseException - if the MPD response generates an error

      • sendCommands

        boolean sendCommands(List<MPDCommand> commandList)
                     throws MPDResponseException
        Sends a list of MPDCommands all at once to the MPD server and returns true if all commands were sent successfully. If any of the commands received as error in the response false will be returned.
        Parameters:
        commandList - the list of MPDCommands
        Returns:
        true if successful, false otherwise
        Throws:
        MPDResponseException - if the MPD response generates an error

      • getMPDVersion

        String getMPDVersion()
                     throws MPDResponseException
        Returns the MPD version
        Returns:
        the version
        Throws:
        MPDResponseException

      • setMpd

        void setMpd(MPD mpd)
            throws MPDConnectionException
        Sets the MPD to run commands against
        Parameters:
        mpd - the MPD
        Throws:
        MPDResponseException - if there is a problem connecting to the server
        MPDConnectionException
